description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; in green ink the head and shoulders of a man with a smile on his face
inscription: LL below image, in pencil: 4 | LL of sheet, in pencil: Privat-exemplar / E 156 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1893
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 22
title: Smiling Head (Self-Portrait), Plate 2 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
